profiles.name: Alex Smith
profiles.biography: Alex Smith has been a river guide for just over three years. In his spare time when he is not running rivers he attends BYU-Idaho and is working towards his Bachelors degree. He loves The great outdoors and river rafting.

profiles.name: Sally Hill
profiles.biography: Sally Hill has been a river guide for one year. In her spare time when she is not running rivers she enjoys going on hikes and reading.
